employees.name: Ruben
employees.personal_goal: To become a civil engineer in the future
employees.career_goal: To grow into a managerial position within the company

interaction_history.content: Ruben received positive feedback for his teamwork and attention to detail as an Assistant Server.
Ruben arrived 15 minutes late for his shift. GID reminded him of the importance of punctuality.
Ruben’s quarterly review highlighted his reliability in handling tasks and excellent customer service. GID noted his strengths and suggested he keep working on punctuality.
Ruben arrived 10 minutes late. GID reminded him that this was his second late arrival and encouraged setting reminders to improve punctuality.
Ruben was promoted to Server. GID congratulated him and encouraged him to focus on his leadership skills.
The manager praised Ruben’s progress in his new role as Server, noting his growth and dedication.
Ruben was late by 20 minutes, marking his third tardiness. GID reminded him of the tardiness policy and advised him to plan ahead for his shifts.
Ruben’s review indicated consistent improvement in his duties, with excellent communication skills. Punctuality remains a noted area for improvement.
Ruben arrived 12 minutes late. GID reminded him this was the fourth instance and stressed the importance of punctuality to maintain team efficiency.
Ruben’s manager highlighted his consistency in delivering quality service and recognized his potential for leadership.
Ruben discussed his goal to become a manager. GID provided resources for leadership development.
Ruben arrived 18 minutes late for his shift, his fifth instance. GID reviewed the tardiness policy with him, noting potential disciplinary action for further occurrences.
Ruben completed a training module on leadership basics. GID congratulated him on his progress.
Ruben was praised for his ability to handle customer complaints effectively and his ongoing commitment to improvement.
Ruben arrived 15 minutes late again. GID reviewed the importance of punctuality and suggested time management tips.
